title: Trump applauds Supreme Court decision over travel ban
text:
The Supreme Court on Monday allowed the Trump administration to...

President Trump on Monday praised the Supreme Court for upholding parts his travel ban on visitors from six Muslim-majority nations.

“Today’s unanimous Supreme Court decision is a clear victory for our national security. It allows the travel suspension for the six terror-prone countries and the refugee suspension to become largely effective,” Trump said in a statement.

“As President, I cannot allow people into our country who want to do us harm. I want people who can love the United States and all of its citizens, and who will be hardworking and productive.”

The president said the ban “was an important tool for protecting our Nation’s homeland” from terror attacks.
summary:

I want people who can love the United States and all of its citizens, and who will be hardworking and productive.”The president said the ban “was an important tool for protecting our Nation’s homeland” from terror attacks.
